body_html:
Have I written custom code: No
OS Platform and Distribution: Redhat 6.6
Bazel version: 0.9
CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.1/9.1
GPU model and memory: K80, 12GB
Exact command to reproduce:

67          tf.train.Server(cluster_spec, job_name, task_index)
# Or
 67         config = tf.ConfigProto()
 68         config.gpu_options.per_process_gpu_memory_fraction = 0.2
 69         server = tf.train.Server(tf_cluster_spec,
 70                                  job_name=job_name,
 71                                  task_index=task_index,
 72                                  config=config)
# Or
 67         config = tf.ConfigProto()
 68         config.gpu_options. allow_growth = True
 69         server = tf.train.Server(tf_cluster_spec,
 70                                  job_name=job_name,
 71                                  task_index=task_index,
 72                                  config=config)

body:
Have I written custom code: No
OS Platform and Distribution: Redhat 6.6
Bazel version: 0.9
CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.1/9.1
GPU model and memory: K80, 12GB
Exact command to reproduce: 
``` 
67          tf.train.Server(cluster_spec, job_name, task_index)
# Or
 67         config = tf.ConfigProto()
 68         config.gpu_options.per_process_gpu_memory_fraction = 0.2
 69         server = tf.train.Server(tf_cluster_spec,
 70                                  job_name=job_name,
 71                                  task_index=task_index,
 72                                  config=config)
# Or
 67         config = tf.ConfigProto()
 68         config.gpu_options. allow_growth = True
 69         server = tf.train.Server(tf_cluster_spec,
 70                                  job_name=job_name,
 71                                  task_index=task_index,
 72                                  config=config)
```
